# How to Watch Main Tera Hero Full Movie With English Subtitle for Free
 
Main Tera Hero is a 2014 Bollywood romantic comedy film starring Varun Dhawan, Ileana D'Cruz and Nargis Fakhri. The film is directed by David Dhawan and produced by Ekta Kapoor and Shobha Kapoor. The film follows the adventures of Seenu, a mischievous young man who falls in love with Sunaina, but has to face the wrath of her father and a corrupt police officer. The film also features Arunoday Singh, Anupam Kher and Saurabh Shukla in supporting roles.
